entry.content:
è±†åŒ…æé—®
#python #ç¼–ç¨‹

https://www.doubao.com/thread/wc24fc05a57442cca
ç”¨crontabæ¯5ç§’è¿è¡Œè„šæœ¬
è®°å¾—ç»™æƒé™chmod +x /root/bot/gendan.py
bug:ä¿è¯é‡‘è®¡ç®—é‚£é‡Œæ¯æ¬¡æ•°æ®ä¸ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œå°±ä¼šå¯¼è‡´æ•°æ®å³ä½¿æ²¡æœ‰å‘ç”Ÿå˜åŒ–ï¼Œä¹Ÿä¼šè¿è¡Œå‘ç”Ÿå˜åŒ–çš„ä»£ç 
ä¸»è¦æ˜¯ipçš„é—®é¢˜ï¼Œæ–°åŠ å¡èƒ½è¯·æ±‚ä¸€äº›å¸å®‰çš„æ¥å£ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æœ‰çš„æ¥å£è¦é¦™æ¸¯

å¼€ä»“æé†’ï¼š

import requests
import json
import os
import time

webhook_url = 'https://qyapi.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/webhook/send?key=f02937f9-f887-4a24-9609-1f0ca686d40c'
url = "https://www.binance.info/bapi/futures/v1/friendly/future/copy-trade/lead-data/positions?portfolioId=3976272489709966337"
MAX_RETRIES = 3  # æœ€å¤§é‡è¯•æ¬¡æ•°
RETRY_DELAY = 5  # é‡è¯•é—´éš”æ—¶é—´ï¼ˆç§’ï¼‰

def make_request(url):

    å¸¦æœ‰é‡è¯•æœºåˆ¶çš„ç½‘ç»œè¯·æ±‚å‡½æ•°
    
    retries = 0
    while retries < MAX_RETRIES:
        try:
            response = requests.get(url)
            response.raise_for_status()
            return response.json()
        except requests.RequestException as e:
            print(f'ç½‘ç»œè¯·æ±‚å‡ºé”™ï¼Œç¬¬ {retries + 1} æ¬¡é‡è¯•: {e}')
            retries += 1
            time.sleep(RETRY_DELAY)
    print('è¾¾åˆ°æœ€å¤§é‡è¯•æ¬¡æ•°ï¼Œè¯·æ±‚å¤±è´¥ã€‚')
    return None

def main():
    try:
        # å‘é€è¯·æ±‚è·å–æ•°æ®
        data = make_request(url)
        if data is None:
            return

        # ç­›é€‰å‡º adl ä¸ä¸º 0 çš„æŒä»“ä¿¡æ¯
        filtered = [pos for pos in data['data'] if pos.get('adl', 0) != 0]

        def generate_json():

            result = [
                {

                    'symbol': item['symbol'],
                    'entryPrice': str(float(item['entryPrice'])),  # ç¡®ä¿ä¸ºæµ®ç‚¹æ•°å¹¶è½¬æ¢ä¸ºå­—ç¬¦ä¸²
                    'positionSide': 'å¤š' if item['positionSide'].upper() == 'LONG' else 'ç©º',
                    'leverage': float(item['leverage']),  # ç¡®ä¿ä¸ºæµ®ç‚¹æ•°
                }
                for item in filtered if item['adl'] != 0
            ]
            with open('output.json', 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
                json.dump(result, f, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
            return result

        def compare_json(prev_data, new_data):
            if prev_data == new_data:
                print("JSON æ–‡ä»¶å†…å®¹æœªå‘ç”Ÿå˜åŒ–ã€‚")
            else:
                print("JSON æ–‡ä»¶å†…å®¹å‘ç”Ÿäº†å˜åŒ–ã€‚")
                # æ‰¾å‡ºæ–°å¢çš„æ•°æ®
                new_items = [item for item in new_data if item not in prev_data]
                for item in new_items:
                    output_str = f"haywarå¼€å•äº†ï¼\näº¤æ˜“å¯¹ï¼š{item['symbol']}\nå…¥åœºä»·ä½ï¼š{item['entryPrice']}\næ–¹å‘ï¼š{item['positionSide']}\næ æ†ï¼š{item['leverage']}\n"
                    print("-" * 30)
                    print(output_str)
                    print("-" * 30)
                    msg = {
                        "msgtype": "text",
                        "text": {
                            "content": output_str
                        }
                    }
                    # å°†æ•°æ®åºåˆ—åŒ–ä¸º JSON æ ¼å¼
                    headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json'}
                    try:
                        response = requests.post(webhook_url, data=json.dumps(msg), headers=headers)
                        response.raise_for_status()  # æ£€æŸ¥è¯·æ±‚æ˜¯å¦æˆåŠŸ
                        print('Webhook å‘é€æˆåŠŸ:', response.text)
                    except requests.RequestException as e:
                        print('Webhook å‘é€å¤±è´¥:', e)

        # è¯»å–ä¹‹å‰çš„ JSON æ–‡ä»¶
        if os.path.exists('output.json'):
            with open('output.json', 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
                prev_result = json.load(f)
        else:
            prev_result = []

        new_result = generate_json()
        compare_json(prev_result, new_result)

    except (KeyError, json.JSONDecodeError) as e:
        print('æ•°æ®è§£æå‡ºé”™:', e)
    except FileNotFoundError:
        print('æ–‡ä»¶æœªæ‰¾åˆ°ï¼Œè¯·æ£€æŸ¥è·¯å¾„ã€‚')
    except Exception as e:
        print('å‘ç”ŸæœªçŸ¥é”™è¯¯:', e)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

å¹³ä»“æé†’ï¼š

import requests
import json
from datetime import datetime
webhook_url = 'https://qyapi.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/webhook/send?key=f02937f9-f887-4a24-9609-1f0ca686d40c'


def fetch_and_save_positions():
    url = "https://www.binance.com/bapi/futures/v1/friendly/future/copy-trade/lead-portfolio/position-history"
    payload = {
        "portfolioId": "3976272489709966337",
        "pageNumber": 1,
        "pageSize": 10,
        "sort": "CLOSING",
    }

    # å®šä¹‰è¯·æ±‚å¤´
    headers = {
        'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36',
        'Content-Type': 'application/json',
        'Accept': 'application/json'
    }
    try:
        try:
            with open('positions_history.json', 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
                old_data = json.load(f)
        except FileNotFoundError:
            old_data = []

        response = requests.post(url, json=payload, headers=headers)
        response.raise_for_status()  # æ£€æŸ¥ HTTP çŠ¶æ€ç 

        # æ‰“å°å“åº”å†…å®¹
        # print("å“åº”å†…å®¹:", response.text)

        try:
            data = response.json()
        except json.JSONDecodeError:
            print("æ— æ³•å°†å“åº”å†…å®¹è§£æä¸º JSON æ ¼å¼ã€‚å“åº”å†…å®¹:", response.text)
            return

        positions_list = data.get('data', {}).get('list', [])
        new_filtered_data = []
        for item in positions_list:
            update_time = item.get("updateTime")
            if update_time:
                update_time = datetime.fromtimestamp(update_time / 1000).strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")
            else:
                update_time = "N/A"

            new_filtered_data.append({
                "symbol": item.get("symbol"),
                "side": item.get("side"),
                "avgClosePrice": item.get("avgClosePrice"),
                "closingPnl": item.get("closingPnl"),
                "updateTime": update_time
            })

        new_positions = []
        for position in new_filtered_data:
            if position not in old_data:
                new_positions.append(position)

        output_str = ""
        if new_positions:
            for position in new_positions:
                position_str = (
                    f"haywarå¹³ä»“ï¼\n"
                    f"äº¤æ˜“å¯¹ï¼š{position['symbol']}\n"
                    f"æ–¹å‘ï¼š{position['side']}\n"
                    f"å¹³ä»“ä»·ä½ï¼š{position['avgClosePrice']}\n"
                    f"å¹³ä»“ç›ˆäºï¼š{position['closingPnl']}\n"
                    f"å¹³ä»“æ—¶é—´ï¼š{position['updateTime']}\n\n"
                )
                output_str += position_str
                msg = {
                    "msgtype": "text",
                    "text": {
                        "content": output_str
                    }
                }
                # å°†æ•°æ®åºåˆ—åŒ–ä¸º JSON æ ¼å¼
                headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json'}
                try:
                    response = requests.post(webhook_url, data=json.dumps(msg), headers=headers)
                    response.raise_for_status()  # æ£€æŸ¥è¯·æ±‚æ˜¯å¦æˆåŠŸ
                    print('Webhook å‘é€æˆåŠŸ:', response.text)
                except requests.RequestException as e:
                    print('Webhook å‘é€å¤±è´¥:', e)

        with open('positions_history.json', 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
            json.dump(new_filtered_data, f, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)
        print("æ•°æ®å·²æˆåŠŸä¿å­˜åˆ° positions_history.json")

    except requests.exceptions.RequestException as e:
        print(f"è¯·æ±‚å¤±è´¥: {str(e)}")
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"æ“ä½œå¤±è´¥: {str(e)}")


if __name__ == "__main__":
    fetch_and_save_positions()

entry.title: github page + grideaæ­å»ºä¸ªäººåšå®¢
entry.content:
